ERR: There was a problem with your request. Please try again later or send us a message at eligibilityapi@nycopportunity.nyc.gov. We will get back to you as soon as possible!

ERR_ALREADY_REQUESTED: You have already made a request. If you have not heard back from us, please send us a message at eligibilityapi@nycopportunity.nyc.gov. We will get back to you as soon as possible!

ERR_TOO_MANY_REQUESTS: It seems that you have made too many requests. Please try again later or send us a message at eligibilityapi@nycopportunity.nyc.gov. We will get back to you as soon as possible!

SUCCESS: Thank you! Your request will be reviewed with confirmation within 1-2 business days.

General.error: Please resolve highlighted fields and the following errors and try again:
General.warning: Resolving the following might render different screening results (optional):

Household.err_members: Household: There must be one head of household.
Household.err_excess_members: Household: The number of household members can not exceed 8 members.

Person.err_num_members: Person: The number of persons does not match number of members entered.
Person.err_num_persons: Person: The number of persons cannot exceed 8 members
Person.warning_on_lease: Person: At least one person should be on the lease.
Person.warning_on_deed: Person: At least one person should be on the deed.
